# Pedilo Project Context

> Pedilo is a commission-free, high-performance online ordering platform for small businesses.

## Main Documentation regarding AI Context
- [AI Context & Features](AI_CONTEXT.md) - **READ THIS FIRST**: Comprehensive overview of features, USPs, and tech stack.

## Core Documentation
- [Frontend README](https://github.com/thiagostilo2121/pedilo-web/blob/main/README.md) - Setup validation and project structure for the web client.
- [Agents Guide](https://github.com/thiagostilo2121/pedilo-web/blob/main/AGENTS.md) - Specific instructions for coding agents working on this repo.

## External Resources (Context)
- [Backend API Repo](https://github.com/thiagostilo2121/pedilo-api) - The companion API for this frontend.
- [Frontend Repo](https://github.com/thiagostilo2121/pedilo-web) - The frontend for this project.
